name: Goodbye (Z's Laboratories)
description:
This is my GGJ18 submission for the theme of "Transmission".
To play use a controller (tested with Xbox 360 controller only)
Controls are:
Back button to exit.
Start button to return to main menu.
A button to answer "Yes"
B button to answer "No"
Right d-pad button to walk right.

I've made this game in honor of my late friend who died recently. Despite suffering from kidney disease and painful treatments for 7 yrs, he was always cheerful and helpful to the last minute...

We love you and will miss you, Mohammed "Deadpool" Aldossery.

RIP friend.
